pageContext.claim: “We ended a lot of other money that's being sent out on a monthly basis and a yearly basis to countries that don't even vote for us in the United Nations. We give them billions of dollars; they don't even vote for us in the United Nations.”
pageContext.analysis: Congress has declined to cut billions of dollars in foreign aid funds, as Trump has proposed. Foreign aid funds are typically directed at programs that further U.S. interests, like fighting poverty and organized crime in Central America, two of the root causes of mass immigration.
